name: Vornado Realty Trust
description: Vornado Realty Trust is a publicly traded real estate investment trust (REIT) that specializes in the ownership, management, and development of commercial real estate. Founded in 1982 and headquartered in New York City, Vornado is one of the largest owners and managers of commercial real estate in the United States. The company's portfolio primarily consists of office buildings, retail spaces, and mixed-use properties, with a significant concentration in New York City and Washington, D.C. Vornado's strategy focuses on high-quality assets located in key urban markets, emphasizing value creation through proactive asset management and strategic redevelopment initiatives. The company is known for its commitment to sustainability and has implemented numerous green building practices across its properties. Vornado Realty Trust is also recognized for its prominent developments, such as the iconic Vornado 555, located in the heart of Manhattan. Through its robust financial position and extensive experience in the real estate sector, Vornado aims to deliver long-term growth to its shareholders while maintaining a strong focus on community engagement and environmental stewardship.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA
